title: Riak Recap for September 19 - 22
description:
Posted on September 23, 2011

Evening, Morning, Afternoon to All -

For today’s Recap: Events, code, slides, and more.

Enjoy and have a great weekend.

Mark

Riak Recap for September 19 – 22

  1. Basho, with the help of various other companies, will be heading up the NoSQL Roadshow taking place in various cities across Europe in November and December. Basho will be represented by Steve Vinoski and Martin Schneider.
    → Dates, locations, and details here.
  2. Susan Potter put the slides online from the “Dynamo: not just datastores” talk she delivered at Strangeloop. (It was a great talk.) Thanks, Susan!
    → Check them out here
  3. We merged a sizable contribution to the Java client from cadement related to Riak Search integration. Thanks, cadement!
    → Original pull request here
  4. Clint Shryock is giving a Riak talk next week and his slides made it onto GitHub in advance (so I suspect that they are not yet finished). Thanks, Clint!
    → Take a look here
  5. Anyone going to Surge in Baltimore next week? Let me know if this is you.
  6. Jeremiah Peschka and OJ Reeves, along with the help of Matthiew Whitfield, released CorrugatedIron v0.1.3.
    → Details here on the Mailing List
  7. Two jobs to pass along:
    → Voxer is hiring Senior Software Engineers in San Francisco to work
    with Riak, Redis, and Node. Details here.
    → Comcast’s NETO team based in Reston, VA is hiring Engineers with
    Riak experience. Details here.
